briefTitle: Controlled Acute Hypoxia Study Comparing Pulse Oximetry to Arterial Blood Samples During Motion
officialTitle: Controlled Acute Hypoxia Study Comparing Pulse Oximetry to Arterial Blood Samples During Motion in Healthy, Well Perfused Subjects With the USB Pulse Oximetry Monitor Interface Cable
summary: To validate the proposed claims for pulse rate and saturation accuracy in a diverse subject population during motion over a specified saturation range.

primaryOutcome.measure: SpO2 Accuracy During Motion Conditions - MaxA Sensor
